comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: That dawg may be thin as a rasher but he'll get sliced if he's still there when she starts up!  Terrific shot NLI, isn't it lovely to see such a famous person at ease with her aircraft?  Those Gallaghers were always the same, they'd take the eye out of your head and the aviatrix out of your sitting room!!!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] I know, she's gorgeous, isn't she? And never cease to be amazed at the number of lone dogs that manage to insinuate themselves into our pictures.

And I bet there was a bit of an atmosphere between the McCallions and the Gallaghers for a while after this!  :)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment._content: Her lifestory seems so amazing; full of unknown...Thanks very much for posting~
